name: Safe Places
description:
✧a tiny game about my experiences with anxiety and agoraphobia✧

TW for subjects of mental distress and anxiety

move around and proceed with arrows

CREDITS:

bitsy, bitsy savior, borksy, bitsy audio and a lot of help from the bitsy discord community

music is from chosic

(this is my first ever try at making a game, so i know it is quite wonky, but i guess that's the charm of learning. also, english is not my first language, so pardon all the grammar mistakes)
